Scene:
The Tea House at Pontocho
(Pontochō kashizashiki / 先斗町貸座敷)

Play: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

Production: February 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Matsukadayū (豊竹松香大夫)

Takemoto Nanbudayū V (竹本南部大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)

Nozawa Matsunosuke (野澤松之輔)

Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))
